lead_paragraph: The Civil War generation which used to sing of the time "when Johnny comes marching home" didn't regard the soldier's return as a problem to himself or any one else. Even the mobilization and demobilization of 1917-19 didn't long upset the domestic economy.
abstract: ed on estimates of post-war natl income
